reg.title: Eligible Entities Regulation
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 162/2012, October 1, 2012]

section.sectiontext: An entity is qualified to be eligible to request that a regulation be made under section 43 (2) (e) (ii) of the Hotel Room Tax Act if the entity

paragraph.paragraphtext: is a not-for-profit business association,
has a place of business in the City of Vancouver, and
engages in tourism marketing on behalf of the City of Vancouver as well as tourism programs and projects in the City of Vancouver.

subsection.subsectiontext: In this section, Resort Area means the land comprising the Sun Peaks Mountain Resort Area, as set out in Minister's Order 135/1996.
An entity is qualified to be eligible to request that a regulation be made under section 43 (2) (e) (ii) of the Hotel Room Tax Act if the entity

paragraph.paragraphtext: is a not-for-profit business association,
has a place of business in the Resort Area, and
engages in

subparagraph.subparagraphtext: tourism marketing on behalf of persons in the Resort Area,
tourism programs and projects in the Resort Area, and
organizing, contributing to or facilitating funding for the capital cost of constructing a public road from the Resort Area to Highway 1 (Trans-Canada).
